name: 500 JAMES HANCE COURT and Knauer and Gorman Construction Co., Inc., v. PENNSYLVANIA PREVAILING WAGE APPEALS BOARD. Bureau of Labor Law Compliance, Intervenor Petition of Bureau of Labor Law Compliance, Intervenor
name_abbreviation: 500 James Hance Court v. Pennsylvania Prevailing Wage Appeals Board

parties: 500 JAMES HANCE COURT and Knauer and Gorman Construction Co., Inc., v. PENNSYLVANIA PREVAILING WAGE APPEALS BOARD. Bureau of Labor Law Compliance, Intervener Petition of Bureau of Labor Law Compliance, Intervenor.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 4th day of August 2010, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED to address the following issue:
Whether the Commonwealth Court erred in concluding that the Prevailing Wage Act applies only to the segment of a bifurcated construction contract receiving public funds.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
999 A.2d 589
500 JAMES HANCE COURT and Knauer and Gorman Construction Co., Inc., v. PENNSYLVANIA PREVAILING WAGE APPEALS BOARD. Bureau of Labor Law Compliance, Intervener Petition of Bureau of Labor Law Compliance, Intervenor.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 4, 2010.
